page.title: 06EVERCREECH LOCAL NEWS
page.content:
DOCTORS SURGERY AND E.C.G The doctor in Evercreech says that it's exciting being a doctor in 1985,but it makes him cross because of the Health Service cuts.In 1981 Â£1,200 was raised to buy an (ECG) Electro cardiograph machine to help the doctor diagnose patients' heart illnesses quickly.
EVERCREECH FESTIVAL
Last year the festival happened in one week full of events.This year 1985, the events will be spread out.There will be a Barn Dance and Hog Roast,a Musical Recital and "some other show of talent" at the end of the year.The proceeds will be for{the Mali Project and{Action Research for the Crippled {Child.
